game.name: Long Journey
game.shortDescription: 긴 여행은 모든 도넛을 수집하는 위험한 레벨을 통해 여행 달콤한 치아 골격으로 재생하는 하드 코어 플랫 포머입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Long journey - Many people know that a large amount of sweets is bad for teeth .. But not for this skeleton! Embark on a long adventure with this skinny sweet tooth and collect all the donuts!

reviewHighlights.text: Long Journey is a cute platform game. From the gameplay side, there are a lot of jambs, shortcomings and bugs. You can highlight the soundtrack, it is...
The game is not bad for its price. I bought to try what it is in general, I remembered my youth. I would add various levels, saves, different music to...
